The main goals of our work are:

- Collaborate on empirical studies and grant proposals that explicitly investigate causal effects involving personality
- Develop guidelines and an integrative framework for causal inference in personality science
- Organize a symposium on causal inference in personality science at the European Conference on Personality (ECP) in July 2022 in Madrid
- Give give a pre-conference workshop for early career researchers on causal inference at the ECP 2022
- Foster collaboration between psychologists and economists
